pkgmetadata.longdescription: libnc-dap is the NetCDF interface for OPeNDAP (based on the standard netcdf 3.6 API), and adds the capability to dereference OPeNDAP URLs. DAP is a NASA community standard: http://www.esdswg.org/spg/rfc/ese-rfc-004

use.flag: Enables full set of regression tests (long).
